main.name: Ankit Varshney
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hello! I’m Ankit Varshney, a dedicated Frontend Developer with over three years of experience crafting innovative and responsive web applications. I’ve had the privilege of working with both dynamic startups and established organizations, transforming complex challenges into seamless digital solutions. My passion extends beyond coding—I love mentoring emerging talent and sharing insights through engaging tutorials and projects. My portfolio showcases a diverse range of projects that address real-world problems with cutting-edge technology. Join me on this journey as we explore the dynamic world of web development together.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out—I’m eager to connect, collaborate, and create impactful solutions!

education.school: Bundelkhand Institute Of Engineering and Technology - UP

work.title: Senior React.js Developer (Full-time)
work.description: Developed a dynamic 'Social Timeline' page using Instagram and Facebook Graph APIs with token authentication to display the three latest posts, boosting engagement. Built a responsive, two-step health insurance premium calculator with real-time API integration for lead generation and seamless redirection. Configured NGINX and managed processes with PM2 to optimize hosting for both frontend and backend services. Modified Strapi URL prefixes to automatically prepend 'content-panel,' resolving routing issues and ensuring reliable API delivery.

work.title: Software Development Engineer - Frontend (Full-time)
work.description: Directed the design and development of scalable, responsive user interfaces for financial products, achieving a 25% uplift in user engagement. Integrated an advanced OpenAI-powered OCR solution to automate data entry, reducing manual processing time by 30%. Developed a comprehensive library of reusable React components for invoicing and approval workflows, enhancing development efficiency by 40%. Implemented lazy loading and optimized state management techniques, leading to a 35% improvement in application performance. Established rigorous automated testing pipelines using Jest, reducing production issues by 20% while ensuring seamless backend integrations.

work.title: Frontend Developer (Full-time)
work.description: Engineered user-centric educational platforms with React.js and Next.js, achieving a 15% improvement in usability through targeted performance optimizations. Streamlined API integrations and refined state management strategies, resulting in a 20% improvement in page load times. Conducted thorough code reviews and enforced best practices, significantly elevating code quality and system stability. Collaborated with designers and backend engineers to deliver visually appealing and responsive user interfaces.

work.title: Frontend Developer Intern
work.description: Contributed to the creation of reusable UI components using React.js, accelerating development cycles and enhancing code maintainability. Identified and resolved critical performance bottlenecks, ensuring a smooth and reliable user experience. Supported version control management and maintained comprehensive documentation, fostering efficient team collaboration.

projects.title: Paper Shapers | Digital Document Management Platform
